name: softmax_d201088
description: Softmax over vocabulary dimension (201088). Used in gpt-oss-120b for logit normalization.
reference:
import torch

@torch.no_grad()
def run(input):
    batch_size, vocab_size = input.shape
    
    # Check constants
    assert vocab_size == 201088
    
    output = torch.softmax(input, dim=-1)
    return output
